comments:
If I checkout a src-tree into an existing empty project Eclipse treats files 
with revisions lower than 1.0 (e.g. 0.9) as if they were modified ("Modified: 
Yes" in the Properties-dialog; ">" before file names in Package Explorer and 
Navigator). If I rightclick on one if these files and choose "Team > Show 
Annotation" from the context menu, then choose an entry from the "CVS 
Annotate" list I get the following error log messages:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Jun 03, 2005 02:51:03.148
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-
in: "org.eclipse.core.runtime".
!STACK 0
